group_1.textLeft: Ui-chan…

group_1.textRight: Ah, is that the “Mr. Purrs-a-lot” picture book you recently bought?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, it is…

group_1.textRight: Mr. Purrs-a-lot’s even been made into a picture @book, huh?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, this book’s story originally came from the @puppet show that aired on TV.
It’s amazing how it’s so easy to read when @adapted into this format...

group_1.textRight: ...Sana-san? You seem to be in kind of a low mood...

group_1.textLeft: Ah, no… That’s not really it...

group_1.textRight: If anything’s bothering you or on your mind, @I can hear you out?

group_1.textLeft: Thank you, Ui-chan…
Um… It’s just… sort of embarrassing...
Well, I’m thinking… of becoming a picture book @author…

group_1.textRight: Picture books like this Mr. Purrs-a-lot one?

group_1.textLeft: I-I guess it *is* pretty weird, isn’t it...

group_1.textRight: Nope, there’s nothing weird about that. I’ll support @you every step of the way, Sana-san!

group_1.textLeft: Thank you…

group_1.textRight: Although, why do you want to be a picture book author?

group_1.textLeft: Um… My initial motivation was because I wanted @to help people who are suffering,
people like me from before I came to @Mikazuki Villa…

group_1.textRight: I think you can definitely do it, Sana-san.

group_1.textLeft: Really…?
Well… I thought picture books would be most @suitable
for expressing what I want to say in an easily @accessible manner…
If I become a published picture book author, @then lots of people will read them.

group_1.textRight: Even little kids would be able to given they’re @picture books.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah… Ai-chan read them too when she was in her labyrinth.
As a matter of fact,
Ai-chan slowly grew more compassionate through @us reading online picture books together.
So that’s why I thought,
by reading a picture book I like, maybe it would @give me inspiration for my own writing.
But the more I read, the more muddled I get…

group_1.textRight: So you looked so troubled because of that…

group_1.textLeft: Huh? Was it that clear just by looking at me…?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, your eyebrows were all scrunched together, @like you were going “Hnnngh”.

group_1.textLeft: Ahaha…

group_1.textRight: Have you already decided what kind of story @you’ll be writing?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, basically…

group_1.textRight: I want to hear the story you’re thinking of, @Sana-san.

group_1.textLeft: Eh…? [chara:100401:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:100401:cheek_0][chara:100401:face_mtn_ex_040.exp.json][chara:100401:lipSynch_1]Hmm… That’s fine, but…
(I won’t be very good at it, but I can’t not try…)
...I understand… I’ll tell you…!
